did.unittitle: Legislation - Waterways, Kentucky - Rough and Green Rivers - H.R. 4788, 10 March 1955, To Provide for the Disposal of Federally Owned Property, Re: Waterways; Report to Accompany H.R. 7596; H.R. 7596, 17 January 1956, To Provide for the Disposal of Federally Owned Property, Re: Waterways; S. 1568, To Provide for the Disposal of Federally Owned Property, Re: Waterways - N.J. Gregory in Support of the Corps of Engineers - Green River Valley Citizen's League, Clippings, The Ohio County News, Editorial, "Now Is the Time to Boost Rough River Dam"; Clippings, Evansville Courier Re: Development of Green River Area, Coal Reserves; The Messenger, Green River Valley Supplement, "Reserves are Huge" - Telegrams - Public Service Advertisement, Nashville, Chattanooga And St. Louis Railway, "... All the Water Any Industry Could Need"; Transportation - Arguments in Support of Green River Valley Development, 2 Pages - Cumberland River Valley Development, Recommendations, 2 Pages - Green River Valley Citizens League, Inc., Press Releases, Meeting; Resolution, 7 Pages - 1 Photograph, Wappapello Dam, Flood Damage - Data Re: Estimated Area Resulting from Flood Control Dams; Background Information, 3 Pages - Committee on Appropriations Re: H.R. 7596, ECC, JR - Corps of Engineers, A.E.
